entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
